definition: (onom.) sound of cawing/sound of infant learning to talk/variant of 呀[ya1]

sentences.english: Many wooden boxes exported to USA are painted with black matte ink.
sentences.chinese: 很多出口美国的木盒都是黑色哑光漆的。

sentences.english: This did not add oiliness , in fact it seemed to keep my skin looking matte.
sentences.chinese: 它不会让我的皮肤看起来油光，甚至有哑光的感觉。

sentences.english: I also observed that the outer shell is completely matte.
sentences.chinese: 还有一点，外壳是完全哑光的。

sentences.english: Small family's wall surface should choose lusterless .
sentences.chinese: 小户型的墙面应选择哑光的。

sentences.english: This time , we bring two DIY versions :electroplated and Matt Bumblebee to you.
sentences.chinese: 这次给大家带来DIY大黄蜂电镀和哑光两个版本。

sentences.english: Soft matte cool tan filled with silvery-white sparkles.
sentences.chinese: 柔和哑光清凉棕黄色充满银白色亮片。

sentences.english: Anodized gloss and matte finish provide visual appeal and years of life.
sentences.chinese: 阳极氧化光泽哑光提供视觉吸引力和多年的生活。

sentences.english: It is high polish with matte finish center and has multiple grooves.
sentences.chinese: 它与哑光中心的高抛光和有多个凹槽。

sentences.english: The face of brick multi-performance to have the skin texture effect sense of reality or the lusterless surface.
sentences.chinese: 砖面多表现为带有肌理效果的质感或哑光的表面。

sentences.english: Vibrant matte orange topped with green shimmer.
sentences.chinese: 活力哑光橙色上带绿色闪光。

definition: variant of 顯擺|显摆[xian3 bai5]
to scrub with an abrasive/to sand/frosted (e.g. glass)
bitten-lips look (darker lipstick applied on the inner part of the lips, and lighter on the outer part)
